short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert and rearrange FM stats from 5-100 to 1-20 and organize them into Technical, Mental, and Physical categories.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple script to convert the player attribute data on fminside.net to the standard FM player attribute format for easier readability.
